patterns: How do I get a library card?
responses: You can sign up for a card at the front desk with a valid ID, or start your application on our website.
Membership is free for all residents! Just bring a proof of address to any branch.

patterns: How many books can I check out?
How long can I keep a book?
responses: You can borrow up to 10 items at a time for 21 days.
Standard loans are 3 weeks, and most items can be renewed twice if no one else is waiting.

patterns: What happens if my book is late?
responses: We are now a fine-free library! However, you must pay the replacement cost for lost items.
There are no daily late fees, but your account will be blocked if items are more than 14 days overdue.
Yes, we offer free high-speed WiFi. The network name is 'Library_Guest' and no password is required.
Free WiFi is available throughout the building for all visitors.
Goodbye! Don't forget to return your books on time.
